tweets.text: Fabulous report on @itvnews about @RedIndustries2 and @WalleysL @EnvAgencyMids is it true you are not able to provide today’s report due to technical difficulties? Forgotten to turn the sensors on AGAIN? @itvnews perhaps you could ask them what tech.diffs mean?

So @itvnews Thank You so much, for reporting our story of Noxious, Acrid, Unbreatheable Air in Newcastle Under Lyme because of the STENCH coming from #WalleysQuarrey Landfill LTD This Story will not go away until we are safe @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyMids @ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA

So @bbcmtd @BBC @BBCNews @BBCRadio4 Thank You for telling the story of #WalleysQuarrey STINK. This is an @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyMids EMERGENCY and the health and wellbeing of our TOWN is at stake. We Live In Hope #lestwedie @StinkStopthe

tweets.text:
Things I thought I’d never tweet for the @EnvAgencyYNE ….

A friend got this clip of a deer swimming and wondering round the #RiverDon in #KelhamIsland, #Sheffield.

It’s really nice to see nature so close to urban centres….. it’s called @theoutdoorcity for a reason 🙌 https://t.co/caWjbvP2JT

People living near a landfill site in Staffordshire say the smell coming from it is so bad they're concerned for their health.

Thousands of complaints have been made and hundreds of people have staged protests.

Now residents say they're at breaking point.

@PeterOfTheLane https://t.co/W4wQGlN64p

@ITVCentral the statement from @RedIndustries2 you aired today is misleading. Their odour levels have NOT dropped, they are still consistently breaching WHO nuisance guidelines as per the @EnvAgency report released today #stopthestink https://t.co/Fx8kzGK9Oy
@SianieRoo @RedIndustries2 @EnvAgency @Cap_it_off Hi - Laura from ITV News here - would it be ok to use your video in our News Bulletin with a credit please?

Well well @EnvAgency refuse once again to be interviewed by the BBC for London News story on sewage dumping by @thameswater, and give a glib, useless written statement instead. What a bunch of shameless cowards you lot are @JamesBevanEA @EmmaHowardBoyd

tweets.text: It is 2.30am and the stench that is @RedIndustries2 landfill Whalley's Quarry is permeating our whole flat. This is an environment disaster, a major public and mental health risk. Awake again, and both of us have work tom. @AaronBell4NUL @StinkStopthe @EnvAgency #StopTheStink

Well thanks @channel5_tv news for covering the story of @RedIndustries2 Walleys Landfill Quarrey LTD, If this horror story is still being told in 2022,2023,2024, this Town will BE a ghost Town. @Cap_it_off @StinkStopthe 
@EnvAgencyMids @EnvAgency Immediate action #stopthestink

tweets.text:
The Darent is flowing freely again through the restored channel in Central Park, Dartford. 

The Grand Opening was a big day! Read all about it here: https://t.co/1LL3E5hsV3

Thanks to everyone who worked so hard on this project. @welovedartford @EnvAgencySE @VeoliaUK @cbecUK https://t.co/hIOLKjW3nL

One year ago today: #StaffsSUNRISE broke ground and began the creation of our new river channel at @stokecity's old Victoria Ground. 
What a difference a year makes! 
Thanks to our partners/supporters on this project: @EnvAgencyMids @SoTCityCouncil @WildTroutTrust @StModwen https://t.co/h8QvZsuGQ1

tweets.text:
There is 10 times more coral reef on the planet than chalk streams. 

The River Wandle is one of only two urban chalk streams in London.

And the @EnvAgency does what exactly? https://t.co/TSHThMTasv

2/5 Our @EnvAgencyMids #enforcement notice requires the #landfill operator to cap parts of #WalleysQuarry by midnight 30/04/21. 

This is an important milestone but there will be more to do limit odour. 

I saw progress today 👇 and discussed next steps with @RedIndustries2 https://t.co/o3V9B20fdG
How cool is this #pontoon and #crane set up being used to repair a failed #floodembankment in #Doncaster on behalf of @EnvAgency and @BAMNuttall 🤩🙌 https://t.co/MkK4oPDJA8

3/5 We’ve now got 4 monitoring stations collecting #airquality data around #WalleysQuarry. 

We’ve shared March data with #health partners to ensure the public have expert advice on the impacts. 

Data, our report & a link to the advice are all here: https://t.co/Hz9p8O6J4n https://t.co/KtCvLJ8Nze

urls.title: Walleys Quarry Landfill Site - Latest Update - Environment Agency - Citizen Space

tweets.text:
In her latest blog post, @floodmary offers some inexpensive, practical tips on preparing for flooding for people who can't afford to install property flood resilience measures in their homes: https://t.co/vObLkNtHBo
@EnvAgencyYNE @LivingWithH2O @YorkshireiCASP https://t.co/dHaxvGZwvl

5/5 Lastly: 🙏 to those who kindly came to share experiences of living with this odour.

I’ve read & listened to social media, letters to me / @EnvAgencyMids & news reports so have been struck by the #mentalhealth impacts already but hearing from people f2f is always v powerful.

tweets.text:
Chatted to many #StopTheStink protestors today outside Red Industries HQ.

🔴 Some wanting apologies
🔴 Some saying going to work is respite
🔴 All saying Walleys Quarry is damaging mental and physical health
🔴 All wanting firm and fast action from the @EnvAgency and @PHE_uk https://t.co/My2poRAf2T

@nightmaresurrey @Guildford_Cons Flood alleviation was a major issue in previous administration. Apparently this has been resolved with @EnvAgency I look forward to seeing what this means for Godalming. Wellies or wetsuits?
@PaulKGB @Guildford_Cons Affordable town centre homes sounds a good thing ... building on brownfield sites ... replacing retail with homes ...#Guildford

@JWillson1 @LDNWaterkeeper @WandleForum @Feargal_Sharkey @alison_fure @BerrylandsNR @BenGoldsmith @CitizenZoo @LivingWandle @battersea_arts @MjTurner_ @MordenHallPkNT @thameswater @SE_Rivers_Trust @EnvAgency I’ve never had a response from the @EnvAgency - others may have a more +ve reports ?

@LDNWaterkeeper @renton_phil @WandleForum @Feargal_Sharkey @alison_fure @BerrylandsNR @BenGoldsmith @CitizenZoo @LivingWandle @battersea_arts @MjTurner_ @MordenHallPkNT @thameswater @SE_Rivers_Trust @EnvAgency Do the @EnvAgency respond to you?

This is just awful 😓 #Newark #Bingham #Southwell #Ollerton @HeartofNewark @TrueBingham @diocswellnott @EnvAgency  
https://t.co/akMK8ZpC4l

@EnvAgency Air quality reports released today showing @RedIndustries2 Walley’s Quarry Landfill consistently & massively breaching WHO health and nuisance guideline levels👇Sign the petition to ensure this does not happen ever again in the UK #stopthestink https://t.co/Lgsdqydotl https://t.co/bLpwh9eYa2

urls.title: Petition: Review the Regulation of Odour Management of Landfill Sites
urls.description: We call for the Government to review how the Environment Agency monitors and manages levels of malodourous gasses. Consideration should be given to compulsory monitoring of emissions of landfill sites and for the EA to be obliged to act with urgency when high levels of odour complaints are received.

tweets.text:
4/5 We’ve been speaking regularly but it was good to meet up with @AaronBell4NUL today. 

@EnvAgencyMids primary focus for #WalleysQuarry is @RedIndustries2 reducing odour so I was able to reassure him on behalf of his constituents that’s our priority. https://t.co/1zieoKZPsc

1/5 Really pleased to be out in #NewcastleunderLyme today with @EnvAgencyMids for a #CovidSafe visit to:
- see @RedIndustries2 progress at #WalleysQuarry
- hear from residents
- see our #airquality monitoring stations
- meet @AaronBell4NUL for an update

tweets.text: @sunnyraisin62 @AaronBell4NUL @johncurtinEA @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgency Totally agree. This is damage limitation. A woman who desperately wants to keep her job as the press is getting more intense. She didn’t actually say anything really did she . It was just like a real time version of that letter we all received. I encourage a full investigation

@theJeremyVine Thanks for highlighting the Silverdale Stink!It’s toxic, @EnvAgencyMids & @PHE_uk disaster that’s getting worse by the day the nausea,the sort throats,the breathing issues it’s out of control- no comment from @RedIndustries2 @StinkStopthe #stopthestink #JeremyVine

tweets.text: @PJennings88 @RiverChess @EnvAgency surely it is illegal to discharge sewage into a globally rare chalkstream unless in exceptional circumstances, such as very heavy rainfall? No doubt as guardians of the environment you’ll be investigating this with alacrity.

@scottdegg @paulconnor23 @eddiemair @darrenadam @TomSwarbrick1 @EnvAgency @RedIndustries2 @StinkStopthe Or like living in a so-called ‘third world country’....no, wait.....it wouldn’t be permitted in those countries.

@paulconnor23 @eddiemair @darrenadam @TomSwarbrick1 I ask myself this everyday, poor regulation from @EnvAgency total mismanagement from @RedIndustries2 in fact a failure to even recognise the landfill is the cause of the stink & now the health concerns grow... it’s like living in the 1800’s #StopTheStink @StinkStopthe

We cant breathe @RedIndustries2
